channel.title: Comments on: New Portland-Based Fund Invests in Women-Led Startups

item.title: By: New Portland-Based Fund Invests in Women-Led Startups

item.description: […] There was some very cool news out of Portland this week, and I wanted to be sure that all of you StartupBend readers saw it. A group of women entrepreneurs, investors and lenders debuted the XXcele… – Read full story at Hacker News […]
